story:
Greek Invention Aristoleo™ Test Kit

      Measures the Healthfulness of 

               Extra Virgin Olive Oil


Greek Translation

Aristoleo™ identifies the healthiest olive oils in the world.

“Aristoleo™ Test Kit is a new Greek invention for measuring significant health promoting phenolic compounds in olive oil: oleocanthal and oleacein. The test is a hand held "lab in a vial" that quickly measures the healthfulness of olive oil. 

"Aristoleo™ Test Kit can discover the healthiest olive oils, guarantee the quality, increase the value and raise the profile of this superior nutritional food"  said Marilyn Harding, Director of Artemis Alliance Inc. 


Hi, I’m Marilyn Harding, director of Artemis Alliance Inc.

Today, we are asking for your help to raise funds to bring Artistoleo™ Test Kit to market in Greece and other olive oil producing countries around the world. Artemis is ready to go into production with Aristoleo™ test kit. It accurately measures the health promoting compounds, oleocanthal and oleacein, in Extra Virgin Olive Oil (EVOO). 

Aristoleo™ Test Kit represents a major scientific breakthrough and the only one of its kind in the world. 

We want to get this into the hands of olive producers for this coming harvest. Growing interest in the distribution of Aristoleo™ Test Kit from other olive oil producing countries in the EU and around the world requires us to apply for greater patent and trademark protection and to increase production to meet global demand. 

                                      Your donation will get us there in time!

What your donations will be used for this year.

1. Patent and Aristoleo™ Licensing and Trademark Registration €15,000

2. Manufacturing and Distribution €12,000

3. Colorimetric iPhone App €3000


If the goal isn't reached where do the funds go? 

The funds raised will be equally split between Patent and Aristoleo™ Licensing and Trademark Registration & Manufacturing and Distribution

What if we exceed our goal?

We are committed to helping the Greek Olive Growers and Producers prosper even under the dire constraints and extra taxes imposed by the debt crisis not to mention  the tough conditions Mother Nature sometimes imposes. 

Aristoleo™ test kits will be made available free of charge to those who cannot afford it. There are many excellent High Phenolic EVOOs being produced by small independent olive growers who would benefit by getting higher prices for their product by having access to Aristoleo™ test kits.

Aristoleo™ Test Kit allows olive growers, olive mills and distributors to quickly test and sort olive oil based on its healthfullness. Consumers are willing to pay a higher price for EVOOs proven to contain health protective high phenolic compounds. 

Eurobank named Aristoleo™ in the top ten innovations in Greece in a recent contest (winner announcement postponed due to bank crisis). 

The EU labeling regulation 432/2012 allows a health claim to be made on the label of EVOO if it contains at least 250mg of phenolic compounds per kg.

Aristoleo™ test kit has already discovered EVOOs that contain many times the minimum requirement. These EVOOs sell for a higher price for a good reason. They are healthier and have a higher medicinal value.


Here in Greece a little goes a long way.

Your donation has a lot of leverage and you will be helping Greek science and research at the University of Athens, the individual olive growers and the Greek olive oil industry as a whole to thrive on the world market contributing to the wellbeing of Greece in its time of deep economic crisis.

My article from HuffPost.gr Greek  English Translation


Why are we passionate?

Three years ago Athan and I travelled to Greece on our way to Italy. But a funny thing happened as it often does when you set out firm plans. Athan was born here in Greece and I had always wanted to visit the Greek islands. But I fell in love with the land and its simple lifestyle, sun and sea and natural foods. It didn’t take much to convince Athan that his native land was the place to be.


To the surprise of many, we packed up our life in Toronto and moved to Greece in search of the best olive oil, thinking that Artemis could export to North America where consumers were becoming more health conscious of the benefits of Extra Virgin Olive Oil (EVOO) at the same time as they were becoming disillusioned by many accounts of fraud and scams on EVOO labelling. Too many had discovered high price was no guarantee of quality.

As health conscious consumers, we wanted to know more for ourselves and that is when Athan discovered the work of Drs. Magiatis and Melliou at the University of Athens. Dr. Magiatis had come across references in ancient texts to the medicinal benefits of early harvest olive oil and, like any great scientist; he followed his curiosity, which led to his Nuclear Magnetic Resonance method to measure individual health-enhancing phenolic compounds in olive oil. 

What began as an interest became a passion. Greece has some of the finest olive oils in the world and in ancient times exported olive oil around the known world. After all, Athens was named for Athena who planted an olive tree on the Acropolis as a gift of life to the new city, and ancient Olympic athletes were crowned with a wreath of olive leaves.

Athan wondered what had happened to the Greek export empire as it now lagged behind its Mediterranean neighbours. He discovered that much of the oil in Greece was exported for the lowest bulk prices to other countries, which often mixed it with native blends. He also discovered that many small growers barely sustained themselves tending olive groves inherited through generations.


Aristoleo™ The Invention

So last year my company, Artemis Alliance Inc..* partnered with the University of Athens to support research in ways to test the medicinal polyphenols in EVOO (Extra Virgin Olive Oil). The result was a product named Aristoleo™ (Greek patent pending). Literally meaning “excellent oil” Aristoleo™ is an inexpensive handheld test kit to measure the two most abundant and medicinally rich phenolic compounds found in olive oil: Oleocanthal and Oleacein.

Research scientists Drs. Prokopious Magiatis and Eleni Melliou and their team at the University of Athens had discovered a method to measure these health-promoting elements using NMR or Nuclear Magnetic Resonance. When we first met, Greece was deep in the economic crisis, the university research funds had been cut and at one point the teaching staff was cleaning their own washrooms. 

We wanted to help.

Testing by NMR cannot be done in the field. The team decided something was needed to help growers and producers in the field to achieve quick and accurate measurement for phenolic compounds. And that was Aristoleo™ - a lab in a vial. Arisoleo™ is verified by NMR for accuracy.


We immediately saw Aristoleo™ as a three-pronged benefit.

1.  Support research and innovation in Greece

2.  Support the olive oil industry in Greece

3.  Promote the health benefits of EVOO to the world


What this means ...

For Greek Research and Innovation:

·  Science and research can flourish in Greece.

·  50% of Aristoleo™ profits go the University of Athens and Dr. Magiatis to fund continuing research.

·  Global patent will protect intellectual property and keep it in Greece.

For Olive Growers and Producers:

“It’s a great tool that we use routinely for in house evaluation of high quality olive oil. Inexpensive, quick and reliable” commented Kostas Peimanidis of Agrovim the largest olive oil producer and exporter in Kalamata, Greece.

·  Olive Oil contributes .5% to Greece's GDP. In this time of crisis, Greek EVOO can compete on the world market at the very best prices based on proven quality. A rise in prices results in a rise in GDP.

·  Based on Aristoleo™ test results, simple adjustments to harvest and production practices can significantly increase the levels of polyphenols, Oleocanthal and Oleacein in olive oil to increase value.

·  Small growers often live subsistence lives, harvesting and selling for lowest bulk prices just to meet their immediate living needs. Being able to test batches for higher phenolic content means higher prices.

·  Average historic prices for bulk olive oil range from €2.50 - €3.20/kg. This year EVOO tested (by NMR and Aristoleo™) with proven high phenolic content sold for up to €15/kg in bulk.

·  With the recent EU debt restructuring, taxes have just increased on farmers already beleaguered by the depressed economy and the vulnerability of weather and pests on crops. Olive growers need every advantage they can get.

“We tested the Aristoleo™ prototype last year in our olive mill and I also use it to demonstrate the superiority of our olive oil to our customers,” said Spyros Dafnis, owner of award winning The Governor brand. “Corfu up until two years ago had a reputation for producing below average olive oil. Today, thanks to Aristoleo™ Test Kit and Magiatis - Melliou research, Corfu Island is now producing one of the highest phenolic olive oils in the world.”

·  Mills can separate EVOOs quickly during the busy harvest and production time by field testing each batch and sorting for premium pricing.

·  Greece has some of the highest phenolic olive oils to serve a growing global community of health conscious consumers.

·  EU labelling allows a health claim for High Phenolic Olive Oils increasing value and market share.

For the Health Conscious Consumer:

·  The EU has instated a health claim for the labelling of EVOOs, which contain 5mg of polyphenols per 20ml reduces LDL oxidation – this means its good for your heart.

In a study on the island of Crete, 12 young men (mean age: 21 years) who consumed 25 ml a day for only four days of olive oils with varying levels of total phenols found that the olive oil with a phenol content of 486 mg/kg could decrease LDL oxidation. 

·  There is so much more to get from EVOO. Research around the world continues to point out the anti-inflammatory benefits of Oleocanthal for the prevention or treatment of Alzheimer’s, arthritis, and cancer, heart disease and research continues.

·  Two tablespoons of High Phenolic Olive Oils daily are truly medicinal in nature and a beneficial part of a healthy eating and exercise regimen.

·  In past years there has been much controversy over the quality of olive oils and the accuracy of labelling. High price does not ensure quality, but the consumer is left in the dark – until now. Health conscious consumers can be assured that the tested and certified EVOOs they purchase are the quality they pay for.


Aristoleo™ is ready to go into production now!

Your quick response and generous donations (every € counts) will make sure we can reach as many producers as possible this harvest. We are launching in Greece and look forward to getting national permits to share this amazing invention to promote excellence everywhere EVOO is produced.


Please share this with your friends and on all your social networks!

Check out our perks!

What do you get in exchange besides great health generating EVOO on the market and knowing you’ve made a big difference? 

Every donation has enormous value and we want to show our appreciation. All donors will be listed on the Aristoleo™  catalogue of the finest EVOOs in Greece and (coming soon) where to buy them around the world. 

But there's more to look forward to!

We are so keen to let people know about the extraordinary health benefits of High Phenolic EVOO discovered using Aristoleo™ that we want you to taste these select Premium Greek Extra Virgin Olive Oils for yourself!


€10               Our personal thank you by letter or phone call and our books.

€50              250ml bottle Pidima High Phenolic EVOO 

                                                               

€100            250ml bottle Volvi Estate High Phenolic WILD EVOO SOLD OUT

 

                                                        

                                                                    or 

                         Yannis Early Harvest EVOO  250ml            

                          

                                                                        or

                                      Pamako "Tsounati"                                                

                                      

                                                                           or

                                                           Cretanthos Organic

                                                     

                                                                       

€250           500ml The Governor Super High Phenolic EVOO 

                                                                          or

                     500ml Divine Olympus High Phenolic and Gold Award Winning EVOO



€500           2 bottle selection 500ml bottle Super High Phenolic EVOO

   


€1,000       5 bottle selection 500ml Super High Phenolic EVOO

                                                       Your choice of the above


Shipping and handling extra calculated FOB Greece based on recipient address and charged separately.

And just for fun, you will also receive a PDF version of my book "Exhilarated Life: Happiness Ever After" and Athan's eBook "Recipes for the Revival of the Hellenic Spirit" (coming December 2015)

I want to extend heartfelt thanks to all of you who contribute by donating and/or sharing this crowdfunding campaign.

                                                 

                                              We believe in Greece,
                                Ancient Wisdom and Modern Science,
                                            Research and Innovation,
                                          Vibrant Health and Vitality.
                                  And we believe in sharing the love!


Many thanks,

Me agape (with love),

Marilyn Harding

*Artemis Alliance Inc., Strategic Alliances in Lifestyle Research and Innovation

A Canadian corporation (2005) located in Toronto, Canada.

story_txt:
Greek Invention Aristoleo™ Test Kit

      Measures the Healthfulness of 
               Extra Virgin Olive OilGreek Translation
Aristoleo™
identifies the healthiest olive oils in the world.

“Aristoleo™
Test Kit is
a new Greek invention for measuring significant health promoting
phenolic compounds in olive oil: oleocanthal and oleacein. The test is a hand held "lab in a vial" that quickly measures the
healthfulness of olive oil. 
"Aristoleo™
Test Kit can discover the healthiest olive oils, guarantee the quality, increase the
value and raise the profile of this superior nutritional food"  said Marilyn Harding, Director of Artemis Alliance Inc. Hi, I’m Marilyn Harding, director of
Artemis Alliance Inc.
Today, we are asking for your help to raise funds to bring Artistoleo™ Test Kit to market in Greece and other olive oil producing countries around the world. Artemis is ready to go into production
with Aristoleo™ test kit. It accurately measures
the health promoting compounds, oleocanthal and oleacein, in Extra Virgin Olive Oil (EVOO). Aristoleo™ Test Kit represents a major scientific breakthrough and the only one of its kind in the world. We want to get this into the hands of olive producers for this coming harvest. Growing interest in the distribution of Aristoleo™ Test Kit from other olive oil producing countries in the EU and around the world requires us to apply for greater patent and trademark protection and to increase production to meet global demand.                                       Your donation will get us there in time!What your donations will be used for this year.
1. Patent and Aristoleo™ Licensing and Trademark Registration €15,000
2. Manufacturing and Distribution €12,000
3. Colorimetric iPhone App €3000
If the goal isn't reached where do the funds go? The funds raised will be equally split between Patent and Aristoleo™ Licensing and Trademark Registration & Manufacturing and Distribution
What if we exceed our goal?
We are committed to helping the Greek Olive Growers and Producers prosper even under the dire constraints and extra taxes imposed by the debt crisis not to mention  the tough conditions Mother Nature sometimes imposes. 
Aristoleo™ test kits will be made available free of charge to those who cannot afford it. There are many excellent High Phenolic EVOOs being produced by small independent olive growers who would benefit by getting higher prices for their product by having access to Aristoleo™ test kits.Aristoleo™ Test Kit allows olive growers, olive
mills
and
distributors to
quickly
test
and sort olive oil based
on its healthfullness. Consumers are willing to pay a higher price
for EVOOs proven to contain health protective high phenolic compounds. Eurobank named Aristoleo™ in the top ten innovations in Greece in a recent contest (winner announcement postponed due to bank crisis). The
EU labeling regulation 432/2012 allows
a health claim to be made on the label of EVOO if it contains at
least 250mg of phenolic compounds per kg.
Aristoleo™ test kit has already discovered EVOOs that contain many times the minimum requirement. These EVOOs sell for a higher price for a good reason. They are healthier and have a higher medicinal value.

Here
in Greece a little goes a long way.
Your
donation has a lot of leverage and you will be helping Greek science and
research at the University of Athens, the individual olive growers and the
Greek olive oil industry as a whole to thrive on the world market contributing to
the wellbeing of Greece in its time of deep economic crisis. My article from HuffPost.gr Greek  English TranslationWhy
are we passionate?
Three years ago Athan and I travelled to
Greece on our way to Italy. But a funny thing happened as it often does when
you set out firm plans. Athan was born here in Greece and I had always wanted
to visit the Greek islands. But I fell in love with the land and its simple
lifestyle, sun and sea and natural foods. It didn’t take much to convince Athan
that his native land was the place to be. 
To the surprise of many, we packed up our
life in Toronto and moved to Greece in search of the best olive oil, thinking
that Artemis could export to North America where consumers were becoming more health
conscious of the benefits of Extra Virgin Olive Oil (EVOO) at the same time as
they were becoming disillusioned by many accounts of fraud and scams on EVOO
labelling. Too many had discovered high price was no guarantee of quality.
As health conscious consumers, we wanted to
know more for ourselves and that is when Athan discovered the work of Drs.
Magiatis and Melliou at the University of Athens. Dr. Magiatis had come across references
in ancient texts to the medicinal benefits of early harvest olive oil and, like
any great scientist; he followed his curiosity, which led to his Nuclear
Magnetic Resonance method to measure individual health-enhancing phenolic
compounds in olive oil. 
What began as an interest became a passion.
Greece has some of the finest olive oils in the world and in ancient times
exported olive oil around the known world. After all, Athens was named for
Athena who planted an olive tree on the Acropolis as a gift of life to the new
city, and ancient Olympic athletes were crowned with a wreath of olive leaves. 
Athan wondered what had happened to the Greek export empire as it now lagged behind its Mediterranean neighbours. He
discovered that much of the oil in Greece was exported for the lowest bulk prices
to other countries, which often mixed it with native blends. He also discovered that
many small growers barely sustained themselves tending olive groves inherited
through generations.Aristoleo™
The Invention
So last year my company, Artemis Alliance Inc..*
partnered with the University of Athens to
support research in ways to test the medicinal polyphenols in EVOO (Extra
Virgin Olive Oil). The result was a product named Aristoleo™ (Greek patent
pending). Literally meaning “excellent oil” Aristoleo™ is an inexpensive
handheld test kit to measure the two most abundant and medicinally rich
phenolic compounds found in olive oil: Oleocanthal and Oleacein. 
Research scientists Drs. Prokopious Magiatis and Eleni Melliou and their team at the
University of Athens had discovered a method to measure these health-promoting
elements using NMR or Nuclear Magnetic Resonance. When we first met, Greece was
deep in the economic crisis, the university research funds had been cut and at
one point the teaching staff was cleaning their own washrooms. We wanted to help. Testing by NMR cannot be done in the field.
The team decided something was needed to help growers and producers in the
field to achieve quick and accurate measurement for phenolic compounds. And
that was Aristoleo™ - a lab in a vial.
Arisoleo™ is verified by NMR for accuracy.
We immediately saw Aristoleo™ as a three-pronged benefit.
1.  Support research and
innovation in Greece 
2.  Support the olive oil
industry in Greece
3.  Promote the health
benefits of EVOO to the worldWhat
this means ...
For
Greek Research and Innovation:

· 
Science and research can flourish in Greece.
· 
50% of Aristoleo™ profits go
the University of Athens and Dr. Magiatis to fund continuing research. 
· 
Global patent will protect
intellectual property and keep it in Greece.For Olive Growers and Producers:
“It’s a great tool that we
use routinely for in house evaluation of high quality olive oil. Inexpensive,
quick and reliable” commented
Kostas Peimanidis of Agrovim the largest olive oil producer and exporter in
Kalamata, Greece.
· 
Olive Oil contributes .5% to Greece's GDP. In this time of crisis, Greek EVOO can compete on the world market at
the very best prices based on proven quality. A rise in prices results in a rise
in GDP. 
· 
Based on Aristoleo™ test
results, simple adjustments to harvest and production practices can significantly
increase the levels of polyphenols, Oleocanthal and Oleacein in olive oil to
increase value.
· 
Small growers often live
subsistence lives, harvesting and selling for lowest bulk prices just to meet
their immediate living needs. Being able to test batches for higher phenolic
content means higher prices.
· 
Average historic prices for
bulk olive oil range from €2.50 - €3.20/kg. This year EVOO tested (by NMR and
Aristoleo™) with proven high phenolic content sold for up to €15/kg in bulk.
· 
With the recent EU debt
restructuring, taxes have just increased on farmers already beleaguered by the
depressed economy and the vulnerability of weather and pests on crops. Olive growers need every advantage they can get.
“We tested the Aristoleo™
prototype last year in our olive mill and I also use it to demonstrate the
superiority of our olive oil to our customers,” said Spyros Dafnis, owner of award winning The
Governor brand. “Corfu up until
two years ago had a reputation for producing below average olive oil. Today,
thanks to Aristoleo™ Test Kit and Magiatis - Melliou research, Corfu Island is
now producing one of the highest phenolic olive oils in the world.”· 
Mills can separate EVOOs
quickly during the busy harvest and production time by field testing each batch
and sorting for premium pricing. 
· 
Greece has some of the highest
phenolic olive oils to serve a growing global community of health conscious
consumers.
· 
EU labelling allows a health
claim for High Phenolic Olive Oils increasing value and market share.For
the Health Conscious Consumer:
· 
The EU has instated a health
claim for the labelling of EVOOs, which contain 5mg of polyphenols per 20ml reduces
LDL oxidation – this means its good for your heart. 
In a study on the island of Crete, 12 young men (mean age: 21 years) who consumed 25 ml a day for
only four days of olive oils with varying levels of total phenols found that
the olive oil with a phenol content of 486 mg/kg could decrease LDL oxidation. 
· 
There is so much more to get
from EVOO. Research around the world continues to point out the anti-inflammatory
benefits of Oleocanthal for the prevention or treatment of Alzheimer’s, arthritis, and
cancer, heart disease and research continues. 
· 
Two tablespoons of High
Phenolic Olive Oils daily are truly medicinal in nature and a beneficial part
of a healthy eating and exercise regimen. 
· 
In past years there has been
much controversy over the quality of olive oils and the accuracy of labelling.
High price does not ensure quality, but the consumer is left in the dark –
until now. Health conscious consumers can be assured that the tested and
certified EVOOs they purchase are the quality they pay for. Aristoleo™ is ready to go into production now!Your quick response and generous donations (every € counts) will make sure we can reach as many producers as possible this harvest. We are launching in Greece and look forward to getting national permits to share this amazing invention to promote excellence everywhere EVOO is produced.Please share this with your friends and on all your social networks!Check out our
perks!What do you get in exchange besides great health generating EVOO on the market and knowing you’ve made a big difference? 
Every donation has enormous value and we
want to show our appreciation. All donors will be listed on the Aristoleo™  catalogue of the finest EVOOs in Greece and (coming soon) where to buy them
around the world. 
But there's more to look forward to!
We are so keen to let people know about the extraordinary health benefits of High Phenolic EVOO discovered using Aristoleo™ that we want you to taste these select Premium Greek Extra Virgin Olive Oils for yourself!€10               Our personal thank you by letter or phone call and our books.€50              250ml bottle Pidima High Phenolic EVOO                                                                €100            250ml bottle Volvi Estate High Phenolic WILD EVOO SOLD OUT                                                                                                                             or                          Yannis Early Harvest EVOO  250ml                                                                                                              or                                      Pamako "Tsounati"                                                                                                                                                                 or                                                           Cretanthos Organic                                                                                                                            €250           500ml The Governor Super High Phenolic EVOO                                                                           or                     500ml Divine Olympus High Phenolic and Gold Award Winning EVOO€500           2 bottle selection 500ml bottle Super High Phenolic EVOO   €1,000       5 bottle selection 500ml Super High Phenolic EVOO                                                       Your choice of the above
Shipping and handling extra calculated FOB
Greece based on recipient address and charged separately.And just for fun, you will also receive a PDF version of my book "Exhilarated Life: Happiness Ever After" and Athan's eBook "Recipes for the Revival of the Hellenic Spirit" (coming December 2015)
I want to extend heartfelt thanks
to all of you who contribute by donating and/or sharing this crowdfunding
campaign.

believe in Greece,                                Ancient
Wisdom and Modern Science,                                            Research
and Innovation,                                          Vibrant

story:
HI! WE'RE THE CLASSICS CAMPAIGN

  We are a fun new education non-profit on a mission to promote reading & self-education across the USA. Our goal is to create a nationwide book club and to host a free online platform where Americans of all ages can discover, discuss, and connect over great literature. 

  Get a READ A CLASSIC poster today and we'll send one to the public library of your choice. Let's get America reading again! Show your love for books, promote education, and help us promulgate the classics! Together, we can inspire generations of Americans to become life-long learners and lovers of books.

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

  We have big, big plans for the future but right now we need the money to help launch our organization and to produce/ship our free READ A CLASSIC posters to public libraries around the country. The goal is to raise $40,000, half of which will go to establishing our national tax-exempt status, building our website, and paying our bills/legal fees/overhead. Get a READ A CLASSIC poster and promote literacy in your community!

THE READ A CLASSIC POSTER SERIES

   Perfect for the dorm room, the board room, and everywhere in between; our Read a Classic lithographs are sure to make a lasting impression on your friends, students, or on anyone within eyeshot. Show off your love for books, encourage others to read, and transform any space into a temple of knowledge and self improvement!

  Stylish & functional, these 24" X 36" inch beauties were designed to turn heads, as well as turn pages! Each poster features a qr code that links viewers to a free digital copy of the book from our website. We recruited a team of illustrators/artist/designers from around the world and charged them to create a masterpiece, for a masterpiece.

  Choose from five of the most popular novels of all time:

FRANKENSTEIN


STRANGE CASE OF DR JEKYLL AND MR HYDE


THE COUNT OF MONTE CRISTO


ALICE'S ADVENTURES IN WONDERLAND


PRIDE AND PREJUDICE


   Our dynamic poster series makes the ideal gift for teachers, students, and ophthalmologists, alike. Created by bibliophiles, for bibliophiles. Get one for the hyper-literate design freak in your life. Do yourself a favor and get two. Do us a favor and get all five!

    And for those who want to DO MORE, BE MORE, and ACHIEVE MORE; consider this your call to arms!

    For the first time in our order's longstanding history, we are opening our doors to the public and recruiting new members into our exclusive organization.  

    Enlist as a member of our secret society and receive your Official Membership Pack. Become a card-carrying Campaigner, read along, and earn promotions. Pledge your allegiance to reading, participate in missions, and rise through the ranks. Join your fellow literati, spread the virtues of literacy, and encourage reading in your community.



   Discover the mysterious origins of our noble order, learn about famous past members and participate in our sacred rituals. Meet our mascot, and live by the Code of the Campaigner. Pull some real rank and upgrade to Commander today!


THE IMPACT

   Our purpose is to increase the number of men, women,  and --most importantly-- children reading fiction for pleasure. The sad truth is Americans don't read. In 2012 the NEA reported more than half (54%) of US citizens didn't read a single novel for pleasure, and PISA ranks America's students as 17th in Reading scores worldwide. 1 out of 5 American adults can't read past a 5th grade level, and a 2013 study shows teenagers are reading 7% fewer books than they did a only decade ago.

   We believe knowledge is mankind's greatest asset and the only tool we have to solve the social, biological, and economic problems of tomorrow. From global warming to a cure for cancer, no matter the challenge the solution requires education. And the fastest means to an education is to read.

WHERE YOUR HARD EARNED MONEY GOES

  Here's how contributions break down. As a non-profit, we strive for transparency and our financial reports will be made available to the public.


RISK & CHALLENGES

   Our biggest hurdle will be fulfilling/shipping all our poster orders. But the more money we raise, the more we can pay for extra help to get it all done. If we do not meet our campaign goal, proceeds will go to the Digital Public Library of America. 


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

   Besides giving, tweeting, or telling your book-loving friends about us, the best way you can help our cause, and to promote literacy, is to read. Read, read often, and be seen reading. Reading begets reading, and the more you read, the more others will read, too. After all, you're a highly influential person!

   Pick up a book; bolster your self esteem, increase your intelligence, and make yourself more interesting to talk to at parties. Read today, and reap the benefits tomorrow!

FAQ

Why aren't you a verified non-profit?  
   As of now we are only a 501c3 in our home state of New Jersey. Part of the money raised will go to applying for national non-profit status from the IRS. We hope to be recognized by the end of 2015,  in order to apply for national grants and federal funding.

 Can I write my donation off as a tax deductable contribution?
   Not yet, as we're not a nationally recognized 501c3. (see above) But as soon as we hear from the IRS, we will let you when and how you can.

Just how many public libraries are there in America?
   According to the 2012 census, there are 9,221 public libraries in America and want to send posters to them all. That most likely won't happen during this campaign, but there's always hope! Who knows, we may end up raising so much money that we don't need to spend time/money applying for a grant, and can get strait to shipping posters coast to coast. 

I live over seas. Can you send my donated poster to a Public Library in my country?
   As of now we only send posters to libraries in the US. But feel free to get two posters and donate one in person to your local librarian! They'll be glad you did!

What are the dimensions of the poster?
  The posters measure in at a handsome 24" X 36" inches. ~60 X 90 cm.

Do you offer any other sizes?
   The posters come in one size and one size only: Prominent. If 24" X 36" is too big,  find a larger wall.  

Can I buy a poster pre-framed?
   Sorry, we can't offer framing at this time. Our posters were designed to hang right out of the tube and fit in standard frames. DIY! Or Support your local framer!

I love books, but I don't like any of these posters. Got anything else?
   We are working on our second series, as we speak, and plan to cover many titles over the months and years to come. Bookmark this page and check back with us in November for updates! Recommend your favorite classic in the comments section, and we'll cover the most popular one in our second series.

Hey, I just looked at the pictures and skimmed the rest of the page. What's going on here, some kinda monster musical?
   To recap: we are promoting literacy. If you want to learn more why reading matters, read this

++THINGS TO NOTE

-- We will email you within 24 hours of contributing with the $5 perks, and to find out which poster(s) you'd like and which library to send them to.


--We can not ship posters to PO boxes. Please provide a street address for quality delivery. 


--Don't forget to add for shipping, otherwise your poster will just sit in tube in our warehouse for all eternity.  And that's a miserable way for anyone to go!

--We will not begin shipping posters to libraries until we have our official 501c3 status. This means you will receive your posters well before your free poster will reach your library. If you just can't wait, and want to see it hanging in your library sooner, get two and drop one off in person to your librarian. You'd be doing us and them a favor!


--Deliveries outside the USA may incur a local VAT or customs charge upon arrival to your country. Unfortunately we can't pay or predict these fees in advance. 

--Feel free to share any of the poster images above with your friends, but remember to give credit and include link to this page. That way, others can see where you found those killer book posters. 


http://www.classicscampaign.org/
story_txt:
HI! WE'RE THE CLASSICS CAMPAIGN
  We are a fun new education non-profit on a mission to promote 
reading & self-education across the USA. Our goal is to create a 
nationwide book club and to host a free online platform where Americans 
of all ages can discover, discuss, and connect over great literature. 
  Get a READ A CLASSIC poster today and we'll send one to the public
 library of your choice. Let's get America reading again! Show your 
love for books, promote education, and help us promulgate the classics!
 Together, we can inspire generations of Americans to become life-long 
learners and lovers of books.
 WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET
   We have 
big, big plans for the future but right now we need the money to help launch our 
organization and to produce/ship our free READ A CLASSIC posters to 
public libraries around the country. The goal is to raise $40,000, half 
of which will go to establishing our national tax-exempt status, 
building our website, and paying our bills/legal fees/overhead. Get a 
READ A CLASSIC poster and promote literacy in your community!THE READ A CLASSIC POSTER SERIES
   Perfect for the dorm room, the board room, and everywhere in between;
 our Read a Classic lithographs are sure to make a lasting impression on
 your friends, students, or on anyone within eyeshot. Show off your love for books, encourage others to read, and transform any space into a temple of knowledge and self improvement!  Stylish & functional, these 24" X 36" inch beauties were designed to turn heads, as well as
 turn pages! Each poster features a qr code that links viewers to a free
 digital copy of the book from our website. We recruited a team of illustrators/artist/designers from around the world and charged them to create a masterpiece, for a 
masterpiece.  Choose from five of the most popular novels of all time:FRANKENSTEIN


STRANGE CASE OF DR JEKYLL AND MR HYDE







THE COUNT OF MONTE CRISTO





ALICE'S ADVENTURES IN WONDERLAND



PRIDE AND PREJUDICE









   Our dynamic poster series makes the ideal gift for teachers, students, and ophthalmologists, alike. Created by bibliophiles, for bibliophiles. Get one for the hyper-literate design freak in your life. Do yourself a favor and get two. Do us a favor and get all five!     And for those who want to DO MORE, BE MORE, and ACHIEVE MORE; consider this your call to arms!



    For the first time in our order's longstanding history, we are opening our doors to the public and recruiting new members into our exclusive organization.       Enlist as a member of our secret society and receive your Official Membership Pack. Become a card-carrying Campaigner, read along, and earn 
promotions. Pledge your allegiance to reading, participate in missions, and rise 
through the ranks. Join your fellow literati, spread the virtues of 
literacy, and encourage reading in your community. 

   Discover the mysterious 
origins of our noble order, learn about famous past members and participate in our 
sacred rituals. Meet our mascot, and live by the Code of the Campaigner. Pull 
some real rank and upgrade to Commander today!




  THE IMPACT
    Our purpose is to increase the number of men, women,  and --most importantly-- children reading fiction for pleasure. The sad truth is Americans don't read. In 2012 the NEA reported more than half (54%) of US citizens didn't read a single novel for pleasure, and PISA ranks America's students as 17th in Reading scores worldwide. 1 out of 5 American adults can't read past a 5th grade level, and a 2013 study shows teenagers are reading 7% fewer books than they did a only decade ago.    We believe knowledge is mankind's greatest asset and the only tool we have to solve the social, biological, and economic problems of tomorrow. From global warming to a cure for cancer, no matter the challenge the solution requires education. And the fastest means to an education is to read. WHERE YOUR HARD EARNED MONEY GOES  Here's how contributions break down. As a non-profit, we strive for transparency and our financial reports will be made available to the public.
   RISK & CHALLENGES

   Our biggest hurdle will be fulfilling/shipping all our poster orders. But the more 
money we raise, the more we can pay for extra help to get it all done. 
If we do not meet our campaign goal, proceeds will go to the Digital 
Public Library of America. 

  OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
   Besides giving, tweeting, or telling your book-loving friends about us, the best way you can help our cause, and to promote literacy, is to read. Read, read often, and be seen reading. Reading begets reading, and the more you read, the more others will read, too. After all, you're a highly influential person!   Pick up a book; bolster your self esteem, increase your intelligence, and make yourself more interesting to talk to at parties. Read today, and reap the benefits tomorrow! 
 FAQWhy aren't you a verified non-profit?     As of now we are only a 501c3 in our home state of New Jersey. Part of the money raised will go to applying for national non-profit status from the IRS. We hope to be recognized by the end of 2015,  in order to apply for national grants and federal funding. Can I write my donation off as a tax deductable contribution?   Not yet, as we're not a nationally recognized 501c3. (see above) But as soon as we hear from the IRS, we will let you when and how you can. That most likely won't happen during this campaign, but there's always hope! Who knows, we may end up raising so much money that we don't need to spend time/money applying for a grant, and can get strait to shipping posters coast to coast. I live over seas. They'll be glad you did!What are the dimensions of the poster?  The posters measure in at a handsome 24" X 36" inches. ~60 X 90 cm. story:
Meet Enay Coaching

Hello! We’re the Enay Coaching team, coming to you live from Valdosta, GA! We’ve all known each other for a few years now, but it was in October 2013 that we started our journey together on this mission: to find and make a big deal of success stories in our local schools. We didn’t originally set out to start a new company—we only wanted to bring attention to anything great that was going on in our schools, and hopefully rally some community support around those success stories. We feel that it is a responsibility of businesses to help their local schools prepare students for the future, so we figured we’d lead by example!


What’s the Enay Project About?

Well, a few classroom visits turned into some requests to do presentations on some of our skills, like graphic design, web design, photography, and the like. Soon, we created some worksheets to go with our presentations, which teachers assigned as extra credit to their classes. Then we came up with some “get-on-your-feet” interactive learning games to teach students about the heart behind the work that we do. We taught about leadership, teamwork, communication skills, financial literacy, and entrepreneurship—and we learned something along the way: while schools are increasing the effort to teach students the right skills for the 21st century workplace, skills alone are not enough. There has to be a certain mindset at work behind those skills. We call it Legacy-Minded Servant-Leadership™, and we found a way to successfully collaborate with great schools and great teachers to coach students in that mindset. It caught on. 


What We’ve Done With Basic Support

Over 1000 volunteer hours and 3000 research hours later, we had a really strong program going, and lots of data to show the impact of our work—and yes, it was working! We even launched another arm of our project to help fund the first part: in the summer of 2014 we started tutoring students in Math and English Language Arts. That was working, too! 


Business Plan Competition Winners!

Finally, in January 2015, the results of a local business plan competition hosted by the Valdosta/Lowndes Chamber of Commerce and Southwest Georgia Bank were announced—Enay Coaching, LLC was the winner! With a $10,000 prize plus lots of in-kind support, we were able to launch the business forward. We established partnerships in three school districts, took on keynote and conference presentation opportunities, upgraded our website, and started a major tutoring contract in a neighboring county. We now have four employees and two contract team members, all passionate about our company mission: cultivating Legacy-Minded Servant-Leaders™!  

Our growth has been steady and DEBT-FREE, and we’re keeping it that way! And now we need your help to meet our goal to raise $75,000 and propel this mission forward. 


What We’ll Do With Your Support

Here’s where your support will go: We’re getting ready to take our curriculum online so that it is available to students across the nation. We are launching a professional development series for educators—produced at the request of educators! We have grown our tutoring services and impact, and soon we will be providing professional excellence training and certification for tutors in partnership with Valdosta State University and Wiregrass Technical College. 

We believe our best investment is to coach other leaders to carry our message forward and reach countless others with the same message. With your help, we’ll be able to make our work accessible to anyone who has a heart for Legacy-Minded Servant-Leadership™ in every area of life.

We’ve shown what we can do with our volunteer time. We’ve shown what we can do with a $10,000 prize. Now let’s join forces to see what we can do together, with your support. 


Where Your Support Goes


Curriculum adapted for online platform

  • 3 types of content: student development curriculum, professional development curriculum for educators, and tutor training and certification
  • customer service capabilities
  • reward system for high performers
  • collaboration capability among users from any location

Increased capacity for tutoring

  • facility support
  • contract team members

Sponsorship of schools and private tutoring students who cannot manage the cost on their own.


If we don’t reach our entire goal, every contribution still goes toward cultivating Legacy-Minded Servant-Leaders™ anywhere a student has internet access. Your support will either

  • sponsor a classroom,
  • sponsor a family for in-person or online tutoring, or
  • sponsor a training workshop for teachers who want to spread the Legacy-Minded Servant-Leadership™ message.

See our Campaign Perks for more details!


The Impact

Technical training alone is not enough to solve 21st century challenges. Students also need to know how to use their training with a team-focused, servant-leader mindset, and they must think practically about how their decisions today will affect the generations that follow after us. Without a program like ours, schools risk raising a generation of professionals, government leaders, engineers, and homemakers who excel in technical skills, but will sabotage themselves and future generations because of a lack of foundation in certain leadership and teamwork attributes. People who lack these attributes risk falling into the trap of short-sighted ambition, and being entangled in a quest for immediate gratification. This disaster is avoidable with the right coaching.


So far, we’ve helped students achieve great outcomes:

  • Teachers reporting that they feel more encouraged to accomplish more in their classrooms
  • Teachers feeling equipped with better ideas and tools to teach teamwork, leadership, and critical thinking skills
  • Teachers feeling more creative and supported in their project-based learning goals
  • Better CTAE skills test scores: at least 21 percentage point increase in end-of-course test scores with our coaching than without our coaching
  • Average grade increase from tutoring after an average of 17 one-hour sessions: 7 grade percentage points
  • Increased number of students self-reporting on gaining a better leadership and teamwork mindset at school and at home.


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Help get the word out and make some noise about our campaign by talking with like-minded people about it.
  • Share this with your friends, family, loved ones, educators, students, community people, government officials, and business people on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, Tumblr, Email, Pinterest, and anything else you may use!
Thank you for reading our story—we have much more to share with you throughout the campaign!

Sincerely,

The Enay Coaching Team

story:
WHAT IS THE PROBLEM OR ISSUE

Students and teachers engaging with technology can create significant positive change in the world. Bumpe High School, a rural school destroyed during the 11 year war in Sierra Leone, used to be one of the most prestigious high schools in West Africa in terms of academics and global connections, but today the community has few collaborative global learning experiences because of a total lack of technological resources. Students know nothing about e-communication or networking (Twitter, Facebook, Email, etc)

WHAT WE HAVE DONE

Our partnership with TakingITGlobal (a youth led non-profit organisation that inform, inspire and involve youths on the world challenges) provided us with the opportunity to raise $ 6,560.00 on GlobalGiving to purchase laptop computers for Bumpe High School.

Two months ago, TakingITGlobal purchased and shipped 12 brand new laptop computers to Sierra Leone for Bumpe High School students and teachers. We can’t establish the computer lab without solar to run the computers. Bumpe Chiefdom is without electricity supply and the only sustainable way to run a computer lab is to install solar to avoid daily maintenance of generator and fuel cost

WHAT WE ARE DOING

I (Hindo) and my volunteers in our small office in Bumpe, we have set up a space within the office where we are teaching students, teachers and community volunteers the basics. Over 100 beginners are attending classes. Because of space, we divided the learners into 10 different groups for classes. Each group comprise of 12 learners and a class for each group runs for an hour on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays.

WHAT WE ARE TEACHING

At the moment, we are only teaching the importance of ICT, basic terms, functions of hardware, programs (word, excel, power point,) and internet until BHS students and teachers return to school in September.

WHO ARE THE TUTORS

I (Hindo) and Francis!

I am a Law student at Fourah Bay College, University of Sierra Leone and the Founder of Global Education And Justice Network https://www.facebook.com/pages/Global-Education-and-Justice-Network/303984359807190?ref=aymt_homepage_panel (non-profit support of educational and development projects in Bumpe Ngao Chiefdom, Sierra Leone with an emphasis on connecting ALL to real-world grassroots). I will be heading back to school in September – though in every two weeks, I travel to Bumpe on weekends to follow-up on developmental and educational projects. Our goal is to provide and support quality education in 62 primary schools, three junior high schools (3) and one (1) senior secondary school (BHS) - Bumpe Ngao Chiefdom.

Francis is an undergraduate studying accounting in the Institute of Public Administration and Management in the University of Sierra Leone. Francis will also return to school in September.

WHAT WILL HAPPEN AFTER HINDO & FRANCIS SHALL HAVE LEFT FOR SCHOOL

There will be nobody to teach the basics because there is no computer literate in the community that will provide such voluntary service.

HOW CAN YOU HELP

We need to install solar and establish a computer lab. The solar will generate income by charging mobile phones for students and the proceeds will employ an IT tutor, a security and for future maintenance of the solar.

$5 contributes to purchasing bulbs and adaptors

$10 contributes to purchasing standing fans, stabilizer

$20 contributes to purchasing 30A controller

$25 contributes to purchasing 200w 24v Inverter

$50 contributes to purchasing wiring equipment

$100 contributes to purchasing 150A Solar Battery

$250 contributes to purchasing 200w Solar Panel

Read more about Hindo and his work:

1.  https://www.linkedin.com/pub/joseph-hindogbae-kposowa/94/239/b59

2.  https://medium.com/@worldleadershipschool/its-contagious-student-directed-learning-spurs-authentic-action-to-end-ebola-c26549dd872b

3.  www.facebook.com/itsjhindo

4.  http://principledlearning.org/1/post/2013/01/fostering-global-leadership-the-patiently-impatient-path-to-change.html

5.  https://www.globalgiving.org/microprojects/environmentaledsierraleone/wall/

story:
The Story


I am looking for funding to create a service that can help bring an end to loneliness, depression, addiction, sexual abuse, and suicide for the students. Since most students not living in residence experience loneliness. But studies have suggested that there is a strong link between loneliness and the social problems that I have mentioned. The most significant consequence of loneliness is suicide, which has taken away more lives of young people than most could imagine.

My name is Godwin. I believe there is a reason why a former Harvard psychologist and current University of Toronto Professor Dr. Jordan Peterson was asking all his students to each take on a social problem for a class assignment. Since no one would believe there is a solution to loneliness, unless the speaker has a PhD or could find studies to prove why this solution is valid. So I have spent over 12 years in doing research, until I have found a way in using studies to show that, there is in fact, a non-religious, easy but effective approach to making friends and getting out of loneliness, that can be a great help to people who need to achieve these goals. I did it because somebody has to spend the time to do this or a significant amount of students could be suffering in loneliness or depression for years by following advice that does not work. My wish is to bring relationship education/science to everyone who wants to be less lonely. My dream is being able to help remove the biggest amount of suffering for people in this world and bringing a great joy to them. I want to use what I have learned to create a service to help students, by offering them the opportunities to make friends and the opportunities to learn about relationship science. This service will cost between $13 and $20 million. However, if we remove 25% from the $13 million service, the amount that Professor Peterson said is good to have ready for unforeseeable expenses, then the service would only cost $9.75 million. Your support will help to spark a change in this world that can stop hurtful or dysfunctional relationship patterns from getting passed down from one generation to the next. This will help a great number of children and young people throughout their lives.


Please click the link below if you want to read more about my story

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B909jKX6asaATV8wX3d6NlBtcFE/view?usp=sharing

The Issues

Does anyone know how much loneliness, depression and suicide are affecting people in North America including the young people today?

Please click the link below if you want to read about these issues

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B909jKX6asaAZWJINlB6NVlQNGM/view?usp=sharing

*Please note, a chair professor of a graduate school program who has verified my finding with other professor was suggesting me to include a list of references of the sources that my writing is based on. So you can look up all these studies yourself. You can also click the Updates tab at the top and find out what was affecting so many Canadians that were between the ages of 15 to 24.

The Professors that are supporting what I think that can help a lot of students

Even though my work including this fundraising project has received no institutional support from the University of Toronto, but a number of U of T professors have agreed to help me on their own. This includes a clinical psychologist, a social psychologist, a relationship psychologist, as well as a professor who was also the Principal of Victoria College, one of the most respected colleges at U of T when he was being interviewed. Please go to the bottom to see the full list of professors who have shown their support for bringing relationship education to high school and/or elementary school students.

**Please note, my work has taken up most of my time, so I am not active on social media. But Professor Peterson has helped me by suggesting me to create a fundraising campaign on Indiegogo. If you see his public facebook page being linked to this campaign at the bottom of this page, then this means he has already read through what I have written and has agreed to support the campaign. In addition, Professor Peterson is also showing his support to this campaign on his personal Facebook and Twitter pages.

About the donations

  • Donations can be any amount you wish (e.g. can be $1, $2, $5). This is a low price to pay for helping to spark a change that can benefit millions of people for life.
  • A Clarification: Indiegogo will close this campaign if we fail to reach the goal of $2.5 million by 29 September 2015. But if we reach that goal, we will have until February 2016 to raise the $13 million needed for the service.

The Video Version of the issues

Please click the link below for the video version of the issues (This is the first video being posted right above my other fundraising campaign)

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/a-science-for-everyone-who-wants-to-be-less-lonely/x/11191254#/story

Sample Pages of my research that might also help you decide why a service needs to be created to help the students

Please click the link below and you can read the unedited and unpublished sample pages of my book. However, the list of references would not be included on this page but would only be included at the back of my book, when it is published.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B909jKX6asaASm9XMlh3WEpFdXc/view?usp=sharing

A Service that can help so many students

This service is a place where people can go to find a solution to loneliness and learn how to use relationship science to build stronger friendships with peers. This means even high school or elementary school students will have a chance to learn relationship knowledge that has been tested by science or time. Students can also get to meet others who are open to making new friends. Relationship Psychologist Geoff MacDonald and other U of T professors have all agreed that I should put this idea into action, even though this idea has received no institutional support from the University of Toronto. I have once created a group using this idea that has helped students to increase their chances in making friends by 3000%. The students who have joined this group have gone from 20 to 120 in a 3-year period.

Students can come in with no friends and coming out with a group of friends in 3 months. My approach is effective, as I have spent years to study why others have failed to help students to make friends and getting out of loneliness. So I know what works and what doesn’t work in helping students. Creating this service would give students a real chance to get out of their loneliness. Otherwise many students are trapped in loneliness, as they cannot find effective help anywhere. According to The Unexpected Legacy of Divorce: A 25-Year Landmark Study, 40 % of single mothers live below the poverty line while their children are more likely to experience loneliness than children in two-parent homes. Children of these single mothers are therefore more likely to have fewer financial resources to cope with loneliness than children from intact families. After working 2 or 3 jobs and cooking, many single mothers have little or no time and energy left to spend with their kids. The social life of the older child might also suffer from having to care for a younger sibling(s).

But living below the poverty line, for many people, means not having enough food to eat. I recently watched a documentary movie in which a child received food at school through a special program. But instead of eating his food, the child hid it---he wanted to take the food home so that his mother could eat. This gave me the idea of making part of this service into a cafeteria or something that sells food and drinks to people, but also offers free meals to students who are children of single mothers in poverty. So these single mothers do not have to spend time making food after long hours of work and they can spend time with their children instead. The cost of creating this service is estimated to be $13 million as the rent alone could cost $2.4 million for a 20-year period. Since the rent at the heart of downtown Toronto is very expensive. But the goal of this service is to establish something permanent that people can go to and find a solution to loneliness, or how can we help so many lonely people? So the giving out of free meals for 20 years would only happen if enough donations were received. But if the donations have exceeded our expectation, I want to add a service that helps students to take care of a younger sibling so students with young sibling can come to learn and make new friends.

Why create a service now but not after I got my book published first?

It has been said that the only way for academic writing to be taken seriously by scholars is for it to be published by a reputable publisher. So I must wait like everyone else. But many people seem to think that, just because it is not their children but somebody else’s children who are lonely and needing help, then it is better to wait than to help immediately. However, justice means do unto others, like how you would like others to do unto you. So I think it is unfair to keep so many students away from what can easily help them to make friends and alleviating loneliness. Relationship Psychologist Geoff MacDonald can tell you more about the pain of loneliness, if you watch the video at the top of this page.

Why needs millions for creating a service to help students to make friends?

When this idea was first conceived, it was meant to become a service for all the students at U of T. At that time, Professor Michel Ferrari said he could get a graduate department to pay for half of its cost, if the university was willing to pay for the other half. But if the university were unwilling to do so, then the graduate department would not be willing to pay anything, because the graduate department could only financially support a project that has the support of the university administration. But the university administration did not agree to provide this funding, even though it knew I had and I still have the support of professors. 

This is why the creation of this service would need so much money from the public. For example, the University of Toronto alone has about 64,000 students. But according to the January 12, 2015 issue of MacLean’s magazine, last year, a survey has revealed, 64 % of Canadian university and college students felt “very lonely” in the last 12 months.  So it is possible that over 40,000 students are being affected by loneliness at U of T alone. But studies have suggested a link between loneliness, depression and suicide. So when 64 % of university students are suffering from loneliness, we need to take this issue seriously. But there are also college students, high school students and elementary school students who are lonely and needing help. Could students afford to help themselves? Maybe a few. But too many students struggle financially and I do not think we should only help the students who can afford to pay but leaving the rest of the students to suffer in loneliness. This is why I want to create a long-term solution or a permanent service in the first place. A service like this would require me to rent a large space —ideally 3000 sq. ft.—for students to drop in and get help, either alone or as a group. A large space is essential. Many students need help—and would much rather find their way out of loneliness or depression through friendships than through prescriptive medication. But this rent would cost $25,000 a month, as the rent at the heart of downtown Toronto is expensive. It seems that without the free spaces that can be provided by a university, rent suddenly becomes an issue that needs generous assistance.

It is because this rent alone would cost $6 million, for a 20-year period. But we also need to spend money on hiring people too. According to professors, hiring educated people is expensive or the average wage of a graduate student is $40 per hour. But being a graduate student, even in the field of psychology, does not guarantee a person’s ability in helping others in alleviating loneliness, otherwise the loneliness problem would have been solved by North American psychologists a long time ago. However, Relationship Psychologist Professor Geoff MacDonald said it is difficult to find a quality relationship science instructor. This can mean the cost of hiring a good relationship science instructor could far exceed $40 per hour. So helping a lot of students is doable, provided if I have the money that allows me to hire the best people. As the cost of hiring one person with such qualification above, for 20 years, can cost $1.54 million, but I will need to hire many people in order to help so many students. Renting a smaller space is possible but that would still cost $10,000 a month or $2.4 million for a 20-year period. Since I know many students might rather be on the waiting list than not getting any effective help at all.

It is understandable that the University of Toronto administrators would want to see studies that can show my approach to loneliness is effective. But absolute proof would take years to determine. According to a former Head of Research and Senior Scientist at the Centre for Addiction and Mental Health Professor Dr. Tony Toneatto, repeated study is a good way to find irrefutable truth. This means that the same study is being repeated multiple times by scientists from different parts of the world but still reaching similar results. But who would want to wait that long?  When so many students in North America are suffering and needing a way out of loneliness, my priority is helping students now. So I need people to support with me with donations. I will be in charge of this service once it is created and will decide where each dollar will go. This will save a lot of time and the job will get done.

If anyone is giving us a free space that we need to create a permanent service for students, we can even put your name right in front of the name of our service. Please note, I did say the estimated cost of creating the service is between $13 and $20 million. The first number is the minimum cost of $9.75 million plus back up funding for unforeseeable expenses, something Professor Peterson said I should keep in mind when I am asking for funding. For example, I might hire extra people to meet the needs of students, such as creating a 24-hour telephone hot line or a live chat online service for students who have questions about relationship science but cannot come to this service in person. The second number is adding $6 million to the first, the price of renting a 3000 sq. ft. for 20 years, plus the Indiegogo platform fee for Indiegogo In Demand, which is 5% of $20 million, that is not the same as the 9% Indiegogo Flexible Funding Fee.

What if the donations are over $2.5 million but far below $9.75 million?

I would use this money to create a service for helping individual school that wishes to create a relation education program for their students that is based on Western and Eastern relationship science. Since I believe the understanding of Western relationship science alone, is helpful but insufficient in helping the students with their loneliness problem. I would use this money for the cost of doing additional research too, as there are some topics that I would like to add into my current integrative research. I can create an office for individual consultation as well.

You can also support the fundraising campaign for my book/research 

Please click the link below if you rather support the fundraising campaign for my book

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/a-science-for-everyone-who-wants-to-be-less-lonely/x/11191254#/story

*But you can also help us by telling other people about this campaign.

In addition, Professor Peterson said the best approach in fundraising is honesty. So I must say I cannot offer any tangible perk to people who donate to this fundraising campaign. Since I have never received any money for helping others, for this work that I have been doing, for the last 13 to 14 years. But I have also given everything that a human being could possibly give into this work for both time and money. As I believe time is everything when it comes to helping people that are being trapped in devastating suffering. This is why I have nothing much to offer to my friends, but many of them still have done the best that they could do to help me over the years, by giving me moral, instrumental, or financial support, until there is nothing more that they could give me. For the reasons above, I hope you can forgive me for unable to offer any tangible perk to anyone who donates. But I believe the intangible perks that my campaign offers are still valuable. As these perks will offer people a chance to voice their opinions and enough public opinions can sometimes be enough to get some schools or universities to create necessary changes to help students. So your opinion(s) might help more students than you could imagine.

Please note, any perk that is related to paying for an instructor to offer a relationship science lesson or workshop to students, can only be fulfilled, if the total donations that I receive cover the cost of creating a service for students.

The List of Professors that are supporting what I think that can help lots of students

Even though my work including this fundraising project has received no institutional support from the University of Toronto, but a number of U of T professors have agreed to help me on their own. Below are the professors whom I interviewed on film in connection with my idea of bringing relationship education to high school and/or elementary school students:

Dr. David Bruce Cook - Political Science Professor and (when he was being interviewed by my movie) he was also the Principal of Victoria College, one of the oldest and most highly respected colleges at U of T

 Dr. Mary Sheila Cook  - Professor of Education, Coordinator of the Vic Concurrent Teacher Education Program and Coordinator of Vic One Ryerson Stream in education Victoria College, U of T

Dr. Michel Ferrari  - Associate Professor of the Human Development and Applied Psychology Department at the Ontario Institute for Studies in Education (OISE), U of T

Dr. Ivan Kalmar  - Anthropologist & Associate Professor of Anthropology at U of T

Dr. Hywel Morgan  - Professor of Psychology from North Park University

Dr. Jordan Peterson  - Clinical Psychologist and Professor of Psychology at U of T who was a Former Harvard Psychologist that has taught at Harvard University for 6 years. He is also very well known for always being a guest or going on talks on Television (TVO).

Dr. Roman Tafarodi  - Social Psychologist and Associate Professor of Psychology at U of T

Dr. Geoff MacDonald  - Relationship Psychologist and Associate Professor of Psychology at U of T

Dr. John Vervaeke  - Professor for the Cognitive Science Program and the Buddhism, Psychology and Mental Health Program at U of T

© Godwin Chan and the Indiegogo campaign Help End Loneliness at Schools and Universities, 2015. Unauthorized use and/or duplication of this material without express and written permission from this site’s author and/or owner is strictly prohibited. Excerpts and links may be used, provided that full and clear credit is given to and Godwin Chan and the Indiegogo campaign Help End Loneliness at Schools and Universities, with appropriate and specific direction to the original content.
